name: Just One More (SilentCurseGames, Chairshot Games, Sito)
name_original: Just One More (SilentCurseGames, Chairshot Games, Sito)
description:
Every 10 seconds, your character dies, and is replaced by a new one. However, not all of these characters are created equal. Some can dash through the air, some never go anywhere without their trusty rocket launcher, others come prepared only with their miniscule size. They all face the same challenge, so what will they have to do to overcome it?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play

You start on one side of two large walls, you have to navigate over, around, or through the walls in under 10 seconds to reach a platform at the end marked with a green lazer beam. 

Move with WASD

Look with the mouse

Jump with space

Ability specific:

Fire with left click

Dash with left shift
